image_encoding_tests module¶

image_encoding_tests.decode_image_from_b64(base64_img_str)¶

This function decodes a base64 image string back into a PIL image usable with TKinter and GUI display. :param base64_img_str: A base64 string containing encouded image data. :return decoded_img: PIL image file ready to use with GUI or processing or download.

image_encoding_tests.encode_image_as_b64(img_NParray)¶

A function which takes an image as a np array and encdes it into a base64 string which can then be passed to the server as a json. :param img_NParray: An image as a np array. :return img_str: A base64 encouded image string.
